quotes: You're allowed to pause without explaining yourself.
Even now, you're growing in ways you can't yet see.
You don’t need all the answers. Just the next step.
You are not too much. You are enough.
The storm will pass. Let yourself float for now.
You deserve the same kindness you give to others.
This moment doesn’t define you. It just passes.
What you feel now isn’t all that you are.
You’ve faced worse — and you're still here.
